review.review_text: Seriously? Almost 2 hours late on my delivery, food is cold, and all they want to do is offer me either 15% off my next order or I can drive...
Not what I expected. Yesterday I ordered pho, the bobo platter, and combo fried rice for my fiancé. Arrived on time. The pho was not bad, n...
